group_1.textLeft: Now let's hear you admit your guilt!

group_1.textRight: Unggghhh...
[chara:301001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:301001:motion_0][chara:301001:cheek_1][chara:301001:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:301001:lipSynch_1]*Sigh*
Fine! I lost, so I'll admit it.
Oh please, everyone makes mistakes.
Anyway, it was a long time ago, when I was@a fan...
What? What are you talking about? You@said you saw it, right?
Rena? Other people saw too?!
I...I'll just die of humiliation!
Let me make one thing clear! This was a long@time ago! Long, long ago!
I'm not her fan at all anymore. We're rivals@now!
Why do you keep dragging your friend into@this?
Did you...really see it?

group_1.textLeft: You were wandering around our dojo!

group_1.textRight: Dojo?

group_1.textLeft: You were caught by the museum's security@cameras as well.
And Rena said she saw you right when@Sayuki got robbed.
And then we saw you fleeing from Walnut's!

group_1.textRight: I didn't ask for eyewitness accounts of@where I've been!
Although, I AM beautiful. I can't help@but stand out in a crowd.
What I want to know is...[chara:301001:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301001:motion_400][chara:301001:lipSynch_1]if you've seen a@binder full of paper clippings?!
So then, you don't know about the binder?!

group_1.textLeft: You were spotted at the scene of multiple@robberies.

group_1.textRight: This can't be happening! I was admitting@something I didn't even do!
First of all, I didn't steal anything.
I was trying to get what was stolen from me@back from that Familiar!
I thought something seemed off... So this@really was all just a misunderstanding.
Of course not! I'd never do something so@unrefined as stealing.

group_1.textLeft: Please accept my sincerest apologies for@accusing you.

group_1.textRight: It's fine. Don't worry about it.
I'm somewhat to blame for behaving so@strangely.

group_1.textLeft: Ria... I mean, beautiful Ria Ami! Thank you@very much!

group_1.textRight: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Oh? You flatter me!

group_1.textLeft: (Ria seems to be in a good mood. Is it@because the misunderstanding was resolved?)

group_1.textRight: (As long as they haven't seen it, nothing@else matters.)
(Anyhow, beautiful people forgive other@people's mistakes.)
(I'm not only beautiful, I'm also generous!@Ah ha ha!)
All right then, if you'll excuse me...
I have a thieving Witch to chase after.
Huh?!

group_1.textLeft: Everything that was stolen from Asuka,@Sayuki, and the museum...
We have to get it all back!

group_1.textRight: Uh, no... I can take care of this myself.

group_1.textLeft: I can't let you do that. I made a deal with@Manaka after all.
We have to clear you of all these false@accusations!

group_1.textRight: B-but...
Er, no! Not at all!
D-don't you worry, Ria Ami!
I just have to get that binder back before@anyone sees it!
